ygData.subject: RE: Instill Doubt (was:Re: Skills Survey)
ygData.msgSnippet: I was under the impression that Instill Doubt was broke in that you could not raise in skill by using it...I used it for two sessions in Highkeep at one point
ygData.messageBody:
I was under the impression that Instill Doubt was broke in that you could
not raise in skill by using it...I used it for two sessions in Highkeep at
one point for about 4 hours total getting 2 successful fears and no skill
increases, maybe this is fixed or maybe it is just tough to get going. At
any rate, good to hear that you are actually increasing in it. I think mine
is still sitting at around 9 skill points.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 10:00 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Instill Doubt (was:Re: [eqbards] Skills Survey)
>
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> >Hey, you forgot one of my favorites: Instill Doubt. Not that it's
> >useful or anything, but it amuses the party in those boring
> down moments.
> >(The "you're not scaring anybody" message still cracks me
> up.) I also
> >have fishing close to maxed, and begging at nearly 70. With
> fishing I
> >can yank in a fish almost every cast now (which replenishes
> a low food
> >supply quite quickly). Begging, on the other hand, stinks.
> I've never
> >managed to get more than a silver. But, by Mithaniel Marr,
> I'm gonna max
> >it just to see if it ever gets better!
> >
> >Kenross Cantoforjado, 32 songs, Innoruuk
>
> Acutally ID is usefull when you are Fear/Chaining, as it
> gives an extra fear
> chance which never hurts. In the last two nights I have
> raised my ID 14 pts
> to 57, long boring camp for a Guise. I know have a base
> charisma of 141 :)
>
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
